title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 2
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

Primož Roglič retains the red jersey, though his gap to Alex Aranburu has been trimmed from 6 seconds to 4. After third place on stage 2, Michael Matthews climbs the standings to third overall.
